title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Tua Injury, Dolphins/Bengals TNF Reaction + 'Sharp or Square' Week 4 NFL Picks
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Tua Injury, Dolphins/Bengals TNF Reaction + 'Sharp or Square' Week 4 NFL Picks
description:
Colin reacts to Tua being carted off the field following a scary hit, what he would do to prevent a similar situation, and why he thinks the best of the Joe Burrow Bengals is yet to come after their TNF W (3:00).

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 4 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Commanders/Cowboys (11:00), Patriots/Packers (13:00), Cardinals/Panthers (14:00), Titans/Colts (16:00), Rams/Niners (18:00), Seahawks/Lions (24:00), Broncos/Raiders (26:00), Jags/Eagles (28:00), and Chargers/Texans (29:00).

Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
